overview:
An accomplished Technology Investment Banker and Operations Management Executive with 15 years experience in the digital media, mobile, Internet and technology field.

Michael is a Principal at Covert & Co., a premium specialty investment bank providing M&A and financing services to technology and media companies.

Previously, Michael was a Vice President at New Century Capital Partners and advised Yahooâ€™s Mobile Marketing and Advertising group. Michael has also held senior management and engineering positions at AT&T, IBM and Mindspeed.

He holds 5 patents in the field of Communications, maintains FINRA Series 62, 63 & 79 licenses, and he also serves as a Board Director of the German American Business Association (GABA) in Southern California.

Michael received an MSEE from the University of Ulm, Germany and an MBA from the Anderson School of Management at the University of California, Los Angeles.
